scripts.check-sandbox: if [[ $(git branch --list sandbox) ]]; then npm run delete-sandbox-tag && npm run delete-sandbox; fi
scripts.delete-sandbox-tag: git checkout sandbox && git tag -d $(git describe --tags --abbrev=0) && git checkout -
scripts.delete-sandbox: git branch -D sandbox && git push origin :sandbox
scripts.update-sandbox: npm run check-sandbox && git checkout -b sandbox && git push --set-upstream origin sandbox
scripts.sandbox-deploy: np $(semver $(git tag --sort=-v:refname | grep -m1 sandbox) --increment prerelease --preid=sandbox) --no-yarn --no-tests --no-2fa --verbose --no-publish --any-branch  --contents=sandbox  && npm publish --tag=sandbox
